experiences.title: Junior Front-end Developer
experiences.subtitle: Uran
workDescription: Worked with a variety of languages such as HTML, JavaScript and CSS to create userfriendly web pages and responsive interfaces.
Worked with CSS preprocessors like Less, SCSS, and frameworks such as Tailwind for streamlined styling workflows.

experiences.title: Back-end Developer
experiences.subtitle: Intellias
workDescription: As a backend developer, I had a chance to grow my skills at this company. I have built many projects with Node.js, Express.js, and Python.
Implemented continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) pipelines using GitLab, Docker, and AWS services, enabling seamless deployment of applications to production environments.

experiences.title: Android Developer
experiences.subtitle: Gecko Dynamics
workDescription: Developed an Android SDK that could be embedded in any 3rd-party application.

Furthermore, my proficiency in React Native and Android development has enabled me to extend my expertise to mobile app development, allowing me to create crossplatform applications that offer a consistent user experience across different devices.

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
experiences.subtitle: NaNLABS
workDescription: Implemented a site-wide redesign and front-end overhaul targeting both desktop and mobile devices. Incorporated responsive image best practices to maximize performance and page speed ranking for SEO.

Designed and developed a microservice for subscription and monetization of the platform using Node.js and NestJS. Separated and refactored the microservice from the main monolith architecture of the app.

experiences.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
experiences.subtitle: Blacksmith
workDescription: I have implemented responsive design, front-end optimization, and the implementation of visually appealing designs using Tailwind CSS, MaterialUI, and SCSS.
I have developed RESTful APIs, integrating databases, and implementing authentication and authorization mechanisms to ensure secure data transactions.
